Reference

Description

myanmarMCCTdata

myanmarMCCTdata: Myanmar Mother and Child Cash Transfer (MCCT) Programme Evaluation Data Handler

Data retrieval and handling

get_mcct_data()

Function to get Myanmar MCCT study datasets and forms from ODK server.

merge_repeats()

Function to merge main ODK form with repeats

Data manipulation, structuring and cleaning

clean_anthro()

Function to clean anthropometric data

clean_hh()

Function to clean household data

get_n()

Function to get number of samples used to calculate indicator

get_n_area()

Function to get number of samples used to calculate indicator stratified by geographic area

get_n_wealth()

Function to get number of samples used to calculate indicator stratified by wealth

split_to_quintiles()

Split observations into quintiles based on poverty probability

MCCT programme coverage indicators

create_mcct()

Function to create dataset with individual-level MCCT-related data from the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

create_mcct_household()

Function to create dataset with household-level MCCT-related data from the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

recode_mcct()

Function to recode MCCT-related indicators for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

Anthropometric indicators

create_canthro()

Function to create raw child antropometry dataset

create_manthro()

Function to create raw mother antropometry dataset

recode_age()

Function to recode age variable and convert to age in days

recode_sex()

Function to recode sex variable

recode_weight()

Function to recode weight variable

recode_height()

Function to recode height variable

recode_muac()

Function to recode MUAC variable

recode_oedema()

Function to recode oedema variable

recode_position()

Function to recode position of height measurements variable

recode_anthro()

Function to recode child anthropometric indicators and calculate anthropometric z-scores

recode_maternal_anthro()

Function to recode maternal MUAC indicators

Infant and young child feeding indicators

create_iycf()

Function to create raw IYCF dataset

recode_eibf()

Function to recode early initiation of breastfeeding indicator for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

recode_ebf()

Function to recode exclusive breastfeeding indicator for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

recode_mmf()

Function to recode minimum meal frequency indicator for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

recode_mdd()

Function to recode child food groups for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

recode_mad()

Function to recode minimum acceptable diet indicator for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

recode_iycf()

Function to recode relevant IYCF indicators for the Myanmar MCCT Programme evaluation study

Antenatal care indicators

create_anc()

Function to create raw ANC dataset

recode_provider_specialist()

Function to recode the specialist ANC provider data for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

recode_provider_doctor()

Function to recode the doctor ANC provider data for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

recode_provider_nurse()

Function to recode the nurse ANC provider data for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

recode_provider_ha()

Function to recode the health assistant ANC provider data for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

recode_provider_pdoc()

Function to recode the private doctor ANC provider data for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

recode_provider_lhv()

Function to recode the lady health visitor ANC provider data for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

recode_provider_midwife()

Function to recode the midwife ANC provider data for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

recode_provider_amw()

Function to recode the auxilliary midwife ANC provider data for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

recode_provider_tba()

Function to recode the traditional birth attendant ANC provider data for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

recode_provider_chw()

Function to recode the community health worker ANC provider data for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

recode_provider_ehw()

Function to recode the ethnic health worker ANC provider data for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

recode_anc_provider()

Function to recode the personnel type providing antenatal care services for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

recode_anc_counselling()

Function to recode counselling associated with antenatal care for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

recode_anc_supplementation()

Function to recode supplementation indicators for antenatal care for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

recode_anc_testing()

Function to recode testing for infections indicators for antenatal care for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

recode_anc()

Function to recode antenatal care indicators for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

recode_age_epi()

Function to recode age-appropriate vaccine coverage indicators for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

Function to recode birth weight indicators for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

recode_diarrhoea()

Function to recode diarrhoea prevalence and treatment-seeking behaviour for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

Function to recode cough/ARI prevalence and treatment-seeking behaviour for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

recode_fever()

Function to recode fever prevalence and treatment-seeking behaviour for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

Function to recode child health indicators for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

recode_water()

Function to recode water indicators for WASH for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

Function to recode sanitation indicators for WASH for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

Function to recode handwashing indicators for WASH for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

recode_wash()

Function to recode water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) indicators for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

Food consumption score indicators

Function to recode Food Consumption Score for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

Function to recode Food Consumption Score for Nutirtion for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

Coping strategies index

recode_csi_consumption()

Function to recode consumption-based Coping Strategies Index for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

Function to recode livelihoods-based Coping Strategies Index for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

Minimum dietary diversity for women indicators

recode_mddw()

Function to recode minimum dietary diversity for women for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

Household food expenditure share indicators

recode_hfes()

Function to recode household food expenditure share for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

Poverty probability index

create_ppi()

Function to create poverty probability index dataset for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

recode_ppi()

Function to recode poverty probability index indicators for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation survey

Calculating survey weights

get_cluster_weights()

Function to calculate probability of each cluster in a sampling frame to be sampled

get_individual_weights()

Function to calculate probability of an individual being sampled in a cluster

get_weights()

Function to calculate the inverse of the probability of an individual being sampled in the population

Tabular analysis

create_table()

Function to create indicator results tables

create_unweighted_table()

Function to create indicator results tables

create_weighted_table()

Function to create weighted indicator results tables

create_anthro_table()

Function to create indicator results tables

create_weighted_anthro()

Function to create weighted anthropometric indicator results tables

Datasets

hh

Raw household dataset from the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

hhMembers

Raw household members dataset from the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

childHealth

Raw child health dataset from the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

iycf

Raw IYCF dataset from the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

anc1

Raw antenatal care dataset for currently pregnant women from the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

anc2

Raw antenatal care dataset for currently non-pregnant women from the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

motherAnthro

Raw mother anthropometric dataset from the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

childAnthro

Raw child anthropometric dataset from the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

townshipData

Raw township profile dataset from the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

villageData

Raw village profile dataset from the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

Supporting datasets

anthroChecks

Anthropometric data checks for Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey household data

anthroDF

Raw anthropometric identifiers dataset from the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

checks

Data checks for Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey household data
